title: MoonFall
description: Vampires and spirits and wolves, oh my! MoonFall is a New Adult werewolf paranormal romance, book #2 in the Knightsbridge Canyon series.When travel writer and werewolf Ashlee Scott is approached with a shocking offer to be the mother of a new race, she must decide where to place her trust: in the hot new werewolf in town, in her first love Will, or even in the shadowy vampire lurking in the background. Pulled in all directions by her family, she must confront her own demons while trying to exorcise others.
author: Drew VanDyke
